meanings.definition: Clothing made by knitting yarn together
meanings.sent1: I love wearing cozy knitwear in the winter.
meanings.sent2: She designed a new line of knitwear for the fashion show.
meanings.sent3: The knitwear hugged her body like a warm embrace.
meanings.sent4: Her knitwear collection was a tapestry of colors and textures.
meanings.sent5: The knitwear felt like a soft cloud against her skin.

meanings.definition: The act of creating clothing by knitting yarn together
meanings.sent1: Grandma enjoys teaching others how to make knitwear.
meanings.sent2: The knitwear class meets every Thursday evening.
meanings.sent3: The knitwear workshop was full of laughter and tangled yarn.
meanings.sent4: She weaved her dreams into each piece of knitwear she made.
meanings.sent5: The knitwear production process requires patience and skill.
